about_the_game:
The demo version of Retro Drive: Revamped includes three fully playable levels (including the tutorial level) with two cars to play from the base game!

All settings and gameplay functionality in these levels are accounted for from the base game.

Leaderboards are also set independently from the base game.

Below is the description from the base game:



Driven by determination and an inspiring Synthwave soundtrack, turn the volume up, put the pedal to the metal, and race to catch up with your pals!

Welcome to Retropolis!

Step into the vibrant world of Retropolis and conquer thrilling driving mechanics, dodging hazardous road obstacles or outrunning the local law enforcement - all while listening to an unforgettable synthwave soundtrack. Every race earns you stars that determine your progress in the game's captivating story. Whether it's racing against the clock or evading the police, your skills will be put to the test.



Customise Your Dream Ride!

Unlock an array of radical, customisable cars using the points you accumulate in-game. The cooler your ride, the faster you'll tear through Retropolis. Cruise the neon-lit streets in style!



Start your Retro Drive!

Experience the journey of a college kid determined to catch up with friends who always seem to be one step ahead. Relive the '80s with a storyline packed with pop culture and cinematic nostalgia washed with new wave influences. Buckle up for a unique adventure in the world of Retro Drive.



Soundtrack of Synthwave Legends

Immerse yourself in the synthwave universe with an unforgettable soundtrack featuring artists like:
  • New Arcades
  • Neon Nox
  • Fantom '87
  • Michael Oakley
  • Sunglasses Kid
  • and many more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent with 4 hardware threads
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent with 4 hardware threads
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB, AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB, or equivalent DX11 compatible GPU with 2GB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Get your '80s vibes in full throttle with the Retro Drive: Revamped Demo! Immerse yourself in the retro aesthetic, gripping narrative, and an unforgettable synthwave soundtrack.
